name: Bullet Hell Jam - Chen on the Moon
name_original: Bullet Hell Jam - Chen on the Moon
description:
Chen went to the Moon for some reason and met a certain fairy. Now you have to fight them both.

Credits:

Clownpiece. Chen and Player (Reimu) Sprites drawn by HopeMetal. Clownpiece, Chen and Reimu from Touhou Project by Team Shanghai Alice

Music Credits:

Sakura Sakura ~ Japanize Dream (Touhou 7 credits theme)
The Fantastic Tales from Tono (Touhou 7 Stage 2 theme)
Diao Ye Zong (withered leaf) (Touhou 7 Stage 2 boss theme)
Charming Domination (Touhou 7 Stage EX theme)
Faraway Voyage of 380,000 Kilometers (Touhou 15 Stage 5 theme)
Pierrot of the Star Spangled Banner (Touhou 15 Stage 5 boss theme)


Night Falls ~ Evening Star (Touhou 7.5 Yukari's theme)</p> Mashups by Braxbro Other credits: m6x11 font by Daniel Linssen
Background moon image from NASA
